snippet.title: SimPocalypse -  Launch Trailer [Official]
snippet.description:
► SimPocalypse on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1351500/Simpocalypse/
​

Talk with the devs/ join community, leave feedback:
► Discord: https://discord.gg/jJ8jEPBh9r
​► Twitter: https://twitter.com/GamesGamex​​
​► Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GamexStudioGames/
​

Game Features/ Goals:
- Survive the post-apocalyptic times
- Manage your citizens to create a powerful settlement
- Advance your civilization by researching new buildings, skills and perks
- Trade and manipulate the Global Market to your advantage
- Increase the powers of your Army to conquer the world 
- Automate while you play
- Time-lapse mechanics...
 
Music: ​
► The Epic Story by MaxKoMusic | https://maxkomusic.com/
​Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
​Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unportedhttps://creativecommons.org/licenses/...
​
Support our work:
► Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/gamexgames​
​
Don't​ forget to SUBSCRIBE to our Youtube channel to stay tuned on the next bigger updates ;) Thanks!
► http://bit.ly/2BNqf69​​
​
Play other games from our studio:
► https://warclicks.com/
► https://gamexgames.com/


We wish you lots of fun playing our games ;)
